video.title: What Infrastructure as Code is All About & How Terraform Helps you Work With It
video.description:
Check out Ashley Davis' book 📖 Bootstrapping Microservices with Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform | http://mng.bz/zrwa 📖 To save 40% off this book ⭐ DISCOUNT CODE: WATCHDAVIS40 ⭐ In this video, Ashley demonstrates how to upgrade your infrastructure through code using Terraform. This video is an excerpt from Infrastructure as Code: Using Terraform to Deploy Kubernetes and Microservices by Ashley Davis. Watch the full video at http://mng.bz/XWwE

📚📚📚
Bootstrapping Microservices with Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform | http://mng.bz/zrwa 
To save 40% off this book use discount code: WATCHDAVIS40 
📚📚📚

In "Bootstrapping Microservices with Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform: A project-based guide", 20-year software veteran Ashley Davis lays out his practical approach to microservices. There’s no unnecessary theory—just working examples, and hands-on learning that you can use to build a useful application! You’ll learn how to create cloud infrastructure with Terraform, how to configure and package microservices using Docker, and how to deploy a microservice application on a Kubernetes cluster. When you’re finished with this engaging project, you’ll have all the skills you need to start building and deploying microservices to your own infrastructure.
